mapper.insert:
insert into fws (
tid, name, age, sex, gjy, xdz, phone, jiguan, birthday, mz, sx, yuyan, shengao, tizhong, xl, zs, lx, state, money, sfzh, sfzdz, gzlx, des, techang, xgtd, remark ) values (
default, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gjy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiguan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yuyan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shengao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tizhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{techang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into fws (
tid, name, age, sex, gjy, xdz, phone, jiguan, birthday, mz, sx, yuyan, shengao, tizhong, xl, zs, lx, state, money, sfzh, sfzdz, gzlx, des, techang, xgtd, remark ) values
(
default, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gjy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jiguan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.yuyan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shengao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tizhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sfzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.techang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xgtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select * from fws where 1=1
and tid like '%${ tid }%'
and name like '%${ name }%'
and age like '%${ age }%'
and sex like '%${ sex }%'
and gjy like '%${ gjy }%'
and xdz like '%${ xdz }%'
and phone like '%${ phone }%'
and jiguan like '%${ jiguan }%'
and birthday like '%${ birthday }%'
and mz like '%${ mz }%'
and sx like '%${ sx }%'
and yuyan like '%${ yuyan }%'
and shengao like '%${ shengao }%'
and tizhong like '%${ tizhong }%'
and xl like '%${ xl }%'
and zs like '%${ zs }%'
and lx like '%${ lx }%'
and state like '%${ state }%'
and money like '%${ money }%'
and sfzh like '%${ sfzh }%'
and sfzdz like '%${ sfzdz }%'
and gzlx like '%${ gzlx }%'
and des like '%${ des }%'
and techang like '%${ techang }%'
and xgtd like '%${ xgtd }%'
and remark like '%${ remark }%'
